alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 09 at 5:19PM MST until February 10 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds gusting up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Judith Gap, Southern Wheatland, Melville Foothills and Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Highway 191 from Big Timber through Judith Gap. Warm and dry conditions combined with the strong winds could cause rapid fire spread. Use caution with any burning activities.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route. Secure loose items to prevent damage from flying objects.

area.areaDesc: Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
